Target E-Commerce Revenue Analysis

DAX Files Overview

This page serves as a central repository for all the DAX measures and calculated columns used in both my Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and Revenue Analysis. Each file contains DAX measures and calculated columns grouped by their specific purpose.

Grouped DAX Measures

  • 1. Revenue Measures

    Includes measures for calculating revenue totals, averages, and percentages, as well as weighted averages.

  • 2. Product Measures

    Focuses on product-related measures such as counts, percentages, and calculated columns for deeper insights.

  • 3. Product Value Bins

    Provides binning logic to segment products by value ranges for trend analysis and comparisons.

  • 4. Dynamic Titles

    Contains measures for creating dynamic titles that update based on user interaction and slicer selections.

  • 5. Dynamic Measures

    Includes measures that enable interactivity, such as dynamic metric switching, for enhanced dashboards.
